roleset.name: cause courage to flag

example.name: almost always with NEG
example.text: Denver-based portfolio manager James Craig wasn't daunted [*]when Friday's rout shaved $40 million from the value of the $752 million Janus Fund he oversees.
example.arg: [*]when Friday's rout shaved $40 million from the value of the $752 million Janus Fund he oversees.

roleset.note: DAUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'daunt' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from daunt.01-v predicate notes)
DAUNTING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from daunting.01-j)
